title: [搬运]【创作/冒险】 vertoak市V11.0大城市
author: mcbbt
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mcbbt 于 2014-7-7 17:06 编辑 

hello，对没错又是我我又来无节操的搬运了！
废话不多说，入正题！
都知道外国的地图最有爱了，所以来搬运他们是种美德
vertoak都市IT'S FINALLY HERE! VERSION TWELVE!它终于来了！第十二版！Fish95.tumbrl.com Note: Same Fish95 as on Reddit. What is creation/adventure? Its a creation with optional adventure(s)! Marvel at the awesomeness of the city, while also searching for ancient treasures. Climb tens of stories in the hopes of finding secret rooms. There are NO rules, so do as you want!So much to do, so much to see. With hidden chests, fun signs and a whole ton of stuff it will take a long time to even explore the entire city!注：同一fish95作为Fish95.tumbrl.com创作/冒险是什么？它的产生与可选的冒险！奇迹在城市的魅力，同时也寻找古老的宝藏。爬在寻找希望的故事有秘密的房间。没有规则，所以做你想做的！事情那么多，那么多要看的东西。隐藏宝箱，有趣的标志和一堆的东西，你将需要很长的时间，甚至探索整个城市！

（我看到了之后我都不敢相信）
第12版—UPDATES:更新：The addition of the town of Adobe Village这Adobe镇村除了Updates and additions to Stone Hollow, Neputal and Factory Town更新和添加neputal和厂镇Refurbishment of many older buildings in the city, as well as a few new ones城市中的许多旧建筑翻新，以及一些新的Redone Subway line翻新的地铁线Redone Lodge重做旅馆Redone Airport (and changed location)重做机场（换地点）Redid the central area of Old City重做了旧城中心区Creation of Quartz Beach Island石英滩岛创作Fixed the terrain, made it prettier, added mountain ranges, and cleaned up the rough edges固定的地形，使它更漂亮，添加的山脉，和清理的粗糙的边缘Ending to the major story arch written主要故事拱写结局ALL buildings are furnished on EVERY level. There are a ton of secret rooms (I can't even remember all of them) Including a massive underground library, explore them to find out their secrets. Do whatever you want! Burn it, explore it or explode it!所有的建筑物都是在每一个水平布置。有一吨的秘密房间（我甚至不记得他们所有的人）包括一个庞大的地下库，探索他们找到他们的秘密。做你想做的事！烧了它，探索它或让它爆炸！大海滩众多聚集的岛屿！远方的城镇更多的地点
豪华房子！


小海滩

看！铁路！

港口

新地点！
如果你们想要的地图版本和即将到来的新照片，我只是要求他们在这里（并注明图片）：http://fish95.tumblr.com/我一般会很快的上传。我还可以回答问题（什么），在这里，虽然这个论坛一般是Minecraft相关
下载最新版本（12版）Made for Minecraft 1.7.2+为Minecraft 1.7.2 +DOWNLOAD LINK NEWEST VERSION (VERSION 12) Download past 3 Older Versions过去的3本下载Version 11第11版Version 11Version 10第10版Version 10
第9版Version 9
Version 9经常被问到的问题：Q: What is the texture/resource pack?Coterie Craft问：材质/资源包是什么？小圈子的工艺Q: Can you give me the coordinates to ____ place?No, that defeats the adventure. Nothing is hidden to seriously, Im sure you can find it with the map given to you in the download问：你能给我____地方坐标？不，那失败的冒险。没有什么隐藏的认真，我肯定你能找到它给你在下载地图Q: Question pertaining to the sewer journals:There are 2 so far. They are hidden, you must find them, yes they contribute to the main quest point.问：关于下水道期刊的问题：有2到目前为止。他们是隐藏的，你一定要找到他们，是他们为主要任务点。Q: How many quests are there?Theres some very small ones that stay within single buildings. As of V11, there is only one large plot arc that ties many areas, events, and books together. It's more like a scavenger hunt for knowledge.问：有多少任务？有一些非常小的，保持在单体建筑。当V11，只有一个大的故事情节，关系的许多地区，事件，和书在一起。它更像是一个知识的寻宝游戏。Q: Can you make the map creative mode/cheats?Just turn on LAN mode, you can do that yourself.问：你能使地图创作模式只要打开局域网模式，你可以做你自己。Q: Can I use your map in a video?Yes! As long as you mention the creator (me) or this forum somewhere! Credit is really appreciated!问：我能在一个视频使用你的地图？是的！只要你提到的创造者（我）或本论坛的地方！信用证是真的很感激！Vertoak City on Planet Minecraft   （vertoak城市星球Minecraft）
想了解更多信息的地图吗？或贡献的秘密，你找到了吗？去vertoak市维基，一个惊人的风扇装置！http://vertoakcity.wikia.com If you would like to show your support set the code below as your signature, and this image will be shown!如果你想展示你的支持将下面的代码作为你的签名，该图像将显示！
